title: Necessity for credit union charter
context: ยง412:10-101 Necessity for credit union charter. Except as expressly permitted by federal law or this chapter, no person shall engage in the business of a credit union, represent itself as a credit union, use a name or title containing the phrase &ldquo;credit union&rdquo; or any derivation thereof, or control any other person engaging in the business of a credit union. [L 1993, c 350, pt of ยง1; am L 2002, c 40, ยง33]
